title: Mom.S01E19.Toilet.Wine.and.the.Earl.of.Sandwich.WEB-DL.x264.AAC
description:
Mom - Season 1 - Episode 19 (WEB-DL - MP4) [Production #119]
------------------------------------------

Anna Faris and Emmy winner Allison Janney star in a new comedy from Chuck Lorre.
Anna Faris plays Christy, a single mom whose newly found sobriety has given her
the ability to see her life clearly... and she does not like the view. Now she
must try to untangle years of reckless decisions in order to make a better life
for her and her kids. But she discovers that just because you want to be a better
person doesn't mean it's going to be easy. Everywhere she looks there are
challenges: She is trying to stop drinking in wine country, have a healthy romance
with her unavailable boss, raise her young son to be a good man despite his father's
influence, convince her troubled teenage daughter to make better choices than she
did, and, perhaps the most difficult task - forgive her estranged mother, Bonnie,
played by Allison Janney, for not giving her any of the tools she needed to handle
life in the first place.

Produced by Chuck Lorre Productions and Warner Bros. Television.


Christy and Bonnie help Regina tie up loose ends on the way to drop her
off at prison. Meanwhile, Alvin spends the day getting to know his grandkids.
